Description: Spacious 3 bedroom apartment in North End. Close to North Station and TD Garden. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Virtual tour is available. Laundry on site. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
